name: Tourist Bus Driving Games
description:
Fasten your seat belts & get ready to enjoy the Offroad Tourist Bus Drive Simulator. Travel through the hills and dangerous paths to reach the destination and show your bus driving skills. Offroad Tourist Bus Drive Simulator is a 3D simulator where you play as a bus driver to drive uphill and on winding roads. Pick and drop people from one place to another. Driving in snow can be fun and a risk at the same time so be extremely careful.

Enjoy the grand bus driving experience, tourist transport and adventurous ride.

Features of Offroad Tourist Bus Drive Simulator include:

+ Offroad Hill Driving Simulator
+ Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements
+ Pick and Drop Tourists
+ 3D Environment having Mountains, Hills and Steep Paths
+ Drive in Diverse and Challenging Weather Conditions
+ Multiple Gameplay Levels
